TestItem.Stem: Why does the author mention Bushmen in South Africa in paragraph 2?

Distractor_list.Distractor: To suggest that ancient artists from all over the world painted animals on rocks
To contrast the location of their rock paintings to those found at Lascaux
To support the claim that early artists worked in cramped spaces
To give an example of other artists who painted in hidden locations

TestItem.Glossary: holy people who act as healers and diviners
